#summary Requirements.

You need JExcelApi for [http://php-spreadsheetreader.googlecode.com/svn/Excel/ SpreadsheetReader_Excel]. You could visit [http://www.andykhan.com/jexcelapi/ JExcelApi homepage]. Download the jexcelapi tgz ball and extract it. Then you just need to put jxl.jar in the same directory with [http://php-spreadsheetreader.googlecode.com/svn/Excel/ SpreadsheetReader_Excel.php].

你需要 JExcelApi 才能使用 [http://php-spreadsheetreader.googlecode.com/svn/Excel/ SpreadsheetReader_Excel] 讀取 Microsoft Excel 97/2000 的試算表。 拜訪 [http://www.andykhan.com/jexcelapi/ JExcelApi 首頁] 取得。下載 jexcelapi tgz 文件包並解開。接著你只需要將 jxl.jar 放在 [http://php-spreadsheetreader.googlecode.com/svn/Excel/ SpreadsheetReader_Excel.php] 的目錄中即可。
